name: GeographyGame
description:
A small Geography Game i made.

Be quick because the faster you guess the correct country the more points you will get.

IMPORTANT!!

There are some bugs in the online version causing it not to play properly, i advise to download it to get the best experience.

Controls:

Left-click to select a country

Right-click to move around on the map

Scroll-wheel to zoom inn and out
